DOC.brief_title: Continuous Labor Epidural Catheter Tubal Ligation Study
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) 13 postpartum woman desire Postpartum Bilateral Tubal Ligation ( PPBTL ) infertility Functional epidural catheter place labor delivery analgesia The epidural still tap within 1cm original depth functional labor analgesia 145 year age ASA 4 status History dural puncture ( `` wet tap '' ) initial epidural catheter insertion History marginal inadequate epidural analgesia labor Cesarean section delivery Examination demonstrate indwell catheter migrate 1 cm original depth secure The end indwell epidural catheter appear cap appropriately cap maintain intact Prolonged sensory motor block , bladder anal sphincter dysfunction , nerve damage , inability ambulate , postdural puncture headache ( PDHD ) , seizures , delivery follow cessation epidural catheter dose Pseudocholinesterase deficiency Allergy NesacaineÂ® ( chloroprocaine ) lidocaine General anesthesia provide delivery History substance abuse disorder History major psychiatric disorder NonEnglish reading/speaking participant
